name: ALTERTOX
goal:
As a toxicologist by education, I have been working for the last 10 years in toxicology on alternative test methods to animal testing. My speciality areas cover 3Rs (replacement, reduction and refinement), regulatory toxicology, zebrafish embryo toxicity tests and endocrine disrupters. I am currently hired as a consultant by the university of Konstanz - CAAt (center for alternatives to animal testing) to run the EU policy program.
On their behalf, I am in charge of fostering the novel technologies and concepts (Tox21, AOP, 3Rs etc.) at the EU institution level in Brussels. I communicate on cell cultures, in vitro techniques, computer modelling and new concepts in safety testing that are emerging from the scientific community.
interests: Budget, Consumer Affairs, Development, Education, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology
